experience.title: Data Consultant
experience.description: Started my own consultancy business, providing software development and data consulting services to clients.

achievements.title: Compliance Tool for Mortgage Broker
achievements.description: Built a tool which lets mortgage brokers extract data from PDFs such as bank statements and payslips and provides a Power BI analytics dashboard to track metrics. AWS Infrastructure written in Terraform, data pipeline built using SQL and Databricks. Saved 30 FTE hours per month for one client.

achievements.title: EBay Store Management System
achievements.description: Built a custom ERP system for an e-commerce business, allowing them to manage their inventory, orders, and sales and connect to eBay. AWS Infrastructure written in Terraform. Saved 20 FTE hours per month and increased sale conversion rate by approximately 10%.

achievements.title: Excel Migration
achievements.description: Migrated a large and complex Excel process that used VBA to generate reports. I migrated this process to use a MySQL database and a pipeline powered by Apache Airflow, Python and SQL. The project saved approximately 100 FTE hours per month. Designed a suite of tests to ensure a smooth transition.

achievements.title: Financial Analysis Web Application
achievements.description: Developed a large-scale application using Typescript and React. This application integrated weather data, energy prices, and site-specific data to calculate expected solar site revenues.

achievements.title: Data Pipelining
achievements.description: Utilised SQL and Databricks to build and maintain data pipelines for collecting and processing time series power data.

achievements.title: Machine Learning
achievements.description: Led a project that forecasted long-term irradiation trends across solar sites in Japan, achieving a 0.4% annual increase in revenue forecasts.

achievements.title: Backend Development
achievements.description: Transitioned from Google Sheets to a more efficient backend system for Cazoo's car purchasing process, achieving significant speed improvements, using AWS Lambda, DynamoDB, Docker, and AppSync.

achievements.title: Data Modeling
achievements.description: Modeled data into Redshift using SQL and DBT.
